alert.note: Alert for Klamath Basin (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 03 at 2:35PM PST until January 05 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM WEDNESDAY TO 7 PM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...South winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...In California, North Central and Southeast Siskiyou County and Northeast Siskiyou and Northwest Modoc Counties. In Oregon, Klamath Basin. * WHEN...From 4 PM Wednesday to 7 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
